topicSummary: Palpitations are an abnormally perceived heartbeat including a feeling of the heart racing, an irregularity, or pounding sensation

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Palpitations: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in March 2015 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last version of this topic. Initiation of empirical beta-blockers in primary care is no longer recommended.
